page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: BEADY NECKLACES.THE COLOURS ARE RED, WHITE,PALE BLUE,LEMON AND A PALE ORANGE.THICK SPLASH BANGLES ARE FASHION ABLE TOO.IN MAKE UP NO ONE COLOUR IS FASHIONABLE .2 NEW COLOURS ARE ORANGE AND LEMON.THERE IS NAIL VARNISH,EYE SHADOW AND LIPSTICK IN ALL C0LOURS. CREAM BLUSHER IS WORN,ALSO FOUNDATION CREAM.ANY COLOUR OF MAKE UP THAT GOES WITH YOUR CLOTHES IS FINE.BOYS' CLOTHES TODAY ARE MAINLY GREY,BLACK AND WHITE. BOYS'TROUSERS ARE CANVAS MATERIAL WITH PRESS-STUDS AND ZIPS ALL OVER THEM.SOME BOYS WEAR FLECK TROUSERS WHICH ARE A MIXTURE OF LIGHT GREY AND BLACK.MOST BOYS WEAR BAGGY CORDS OR SKIN TIGHT JEANS.THE RAGE FOR BREAK DANCERS IS PUMA,NIKE AND ADIDAS TRAINERS.
